channel.title: Docker images on FPFIS Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Docker images on FPFIS Documentation

item.title: Varnish
item.description: Reference environment variables HTTP_PORT Port to listen to DEFAULT_BACKEND Backend to connect to Mouting VCL VCL must be mounted in /etc/varnish and a default.vcl should be present. Example docker run -ti --rm -e DEFAULT_BACKEND=172.16.10.1:8080 -v $(pwd)/varnish:/etc/varnish fpfis/varnish
